attributes.additional_details: This will take the financial pressure off working parents who will therefore struggle due to having to take time out of work to look after children who would usually be in full-time school.
attributes.background: In the case of schools closing due to the coronavirus, help should be provided to financially support working parents who will need to take time out of work.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302284

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
